alert.note: Alert for Lee (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 4:56PM EDT until May 03 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lee County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bishopville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Bishopville, Lee State Park, Lucknow, Manville and Ashland. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 108 and 119. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
